messages.title: A balanced budget for Britain
messages.content: The Liberal Democrats have committed to invest £8 billion a year more in the NHS to ensure it remains a world class service we can continue to be proud of.

messages.title: Don't let the Tories get their hands on our local NHS
messages.content: In her recent 8-page plan for Northumberland, the Conservative candidate did not mention the NHS or local health services once.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Invest £8 billion more in the NHS annually to ensure it remains world-class.
Provide a £400 tax cut for local workers.

mentions.tacticalSituation: Labour, UKIP or Greens helping the Tories by splitting the vote, Lib Dems only real alternative to Conservative Party.

issues.economy: We need to go all the way to Berwick. Thanks to Julie, Berwick and Blyth valley are now on track to benefit from the biggest single investment - dualling large stretches of the road to improve flow and increase safety. Vote Julie and the team are focusing on making sure work gets underway.
issues.health: Don't let the Tories get their hands on our local NHS. Protecting local public services including Berwick-upon-Tweed's emergency health service.

leaflet.personalStatement: A strong local champion for Northumberland

quotes.text: Only Julie can beat the Tories on May 7th.
The Conservatives are throwing the kitchen sink at winning Berwick.

images.caption: Graph showing Lib Dem as the leading party in constituency.

leaflet.additionalNotes: Julie Pörksen is depicted in various images campaigning.
